Software

I work as a full-stack web and systems engineer across a variety of technologies, including RoR, JavaScript/CoffeeScript, and something called TcL. My background includes .NET/WPF applications development with Prism, and I have experience with a number of functional languages (including Haskell and OCaml), which is reflected in the way I solve programming problems.
